title: Add footer credit text "Made by Anuj"

requirements.text: Update the app footer in the main game view to include a closing credit line that says "Made by Anuj" (English text), placed at the end of the footer so it appears as the last credit shown on the page.

quotes: at last say mad by anuj

acceptanceCriteria: In the Cap Clicker main screen footer, the text "Made by Anuj" is visible to users.
The credit appears as the last line/item in the footer content (i.e., after the existing copyright and caffeine.ai link).
The added text uses the existing footer styling (or a compatible subtle style) and does not break the layout on mobile or desktop.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep changes limited to adding the footer credit; do not alter gameplay logic.
nonGoals: Do not add a new screen/page (e.g., About page) for the credit unless necessary.
Do not change the existing visual theme beyond what is needed to display the new footer text.
